mapper.select: SELECT a.*,m.MTYS_PK FROM sc_waimai_setting a LEFT JOIN sc_mt_shop_mapping m ON a.SHOP_FK = m.MTYS_EPOILD WHERE SHOP_FK = #{SHOP_ID};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_waimai_setting ( WM_PK, WM_PSSD, WM_QPJG, WM_PSJG, WM_MPSF, WM_PSBJ, WM_PSQY, WM_PSWXD, SHOP_FK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{WM_PSSD}, #{WM_QPJG}, #{WM_PSJG}, #{WM_MPSF}, #{WM_PSBJ}, #{WM_PSQY}, #{WM_PSWXD}, #{SHOP_ID}, NOW(), #{CREATE_BY} )
INSERT INTO sc_waimai_setting ( WM_PK, SHOP_FK, MT_SWITCH, EB_SWITCH, WM_ZDQRDD, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{SHOP_ID}, #{MT_SWITCH}, #{EB_SWITCH}, #{WM_ZDQRDD}, NOW(), #{CREATE_BY} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sc_waimai_setting SET MT_SWITCH = #{MT_SWITCH}, EB_SWITCH=#{EB_SWITCH},WM_ZDQRDD=#{WM_ZDQRDD}, UPDATE_TIME=NOW(),UPDATE_BY=#{UPDATE_BY} WHERE WM_PK = #{WM_PK};

UPDATE sc_waimai_setting SET WM_PSSD = #{WM_PSSD}, WM_QPJG=#{WM_QPJG}, WM_PSJG=#{WM_PSJG}, WM_MPSF=#{WM_MPSF}, WM_PSBJ=#{WM_PSBJ},WM_PSQY=#{WM_PSQY},WM_PSWXD=#{WM_PSWXD},UPDATE_TIME=NOW(),UPDATE_BY=#{UPDATE_BY} WHERE WM_PK = #{WM_PK};
